title: Relationship-Centered Strategies for Enhancing Principal Leadership and Teacher Commitment

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of organizational management and educational leadership
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professionals exploring strategies to maintain organizational commitment by applying relationship-centered leadership theory.

learning_goals: School organizational health can be evaluated using teacher dedication measurement indicators.
Relationship-centered leadership skills (active listening, empathetic feedback, trust-building) can be applied to real-world cases.
Learners can analyze three major factors causing decreased teacher engagement and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
